content:
### Bug Fixes

* **db:** fix collectable trade display.
* **db:** fixed add item to list input combo in item db pages.
* **db:** fixed wrong currency shown on some tomestone trades.
* **desktop:** fixed an issue with retainer crystals and gil tracking.
* **simulator:** actions sort in multi-row rotations now drags properly.


### Features

* **db:** support for korean v6.25 update.

### Bug Fixes

* **support:** fixed patreon oauth and better tipeee connect logic.

### Bug Fixes

* **desktop:** fixed patreon and discord oauth.
* **patreon:** fix patron status sometimes removed after benefits were applied manually.


### Features

* **core:** you can now connect with tipeee to get supporter perks.
* **db:** 6.38 update content.


### Performance Improvements

* **fish-train:** refactored fish train persistence to lower database stress.

### Bug Fixes

* **core:** better handling of gubal websocket creation failing.

### Bug Fixes

* **db:** fixed fish bite etime chart on fishing spot pages.
* **db:** fixed some instances not loading properly, also made loading faster for instances.
* **gearset:** set base confidence rate to 0.66 for melding prediction for more intuitive results.
* **list:** filling from inventory now tarts with final items.
* **list-pricing:** fixed "exclude completed items" checkbox.


### Features

* **db:** hour of the day chart on fish is now using bars instead of line representation.
* **patreon:** 6 new patrons, thanks for your support !.

### Bug Fixes

* **core:** removing lists history for now, it stresses the DB too hard for almost no user benefits.

### Bug Fixes

* **allagan-reports:** don't update list if rows are selected.
* **db:** fixed mogstation icon not loading.
* **db:** move http connection to new graphQL API too.
* **leveling-equipment:** fixed gloves always suggested as level 51 gloves.
* **simulator:** fixed simulator not opening for KR/CN users.


### Features

* **db:** import of 300+ allagan reports.
* **fishing:** increased accuracy in etime report and db chart.
* **lists:** basic version of the contribution stats popup.
* **lists:** list history system for online lists.


### Performance Improvements

* **core:** new graphql API.
* **core:** new lodestone api with cache layer for faster loading.
* **gc-supply:** now using lazy data for faster loading and better data.

### Bug Fixes

* **allagan-reports:** don't update list if rows are selected.
* **db:** fixed mogstation icon not loading.
* **leveling-equipment:** fixed gloves always suggested as level 51 gloves.
* **simulator:** fixed simulator not opening for KR/CN users.


### Features

* **db:** import of 300+ allagan reports.
* **fishing:** increased accuracy in etime report and db chart.
* **lists:** basic version of the contribution stats popup.
* **lists:** list history system for online lists.


### Performance Improvements

* **core:** new graphql API.
* **core:** new lodestone api with cache layer for faster loading.
* **gc-supply:** now using lazy data for faster loading and better data.

### Bug Fixes

* **fish-trains:** fixed board train button sometimes not showing.
* **list-details:** fixed list reset freezing the app entirely.


### Features

* **patch-notes:** popup now shows up to 10 versions in the past based on last update seen.

### Bug Fixes

* **allagan-reports:** fixed instance source input not suggesting values.
* **allagan-reports:** new QUEST data source.
* **allagan-reports:** remove currencies and auto extract achievements.
* **desktop:** auto deny external media access, including audio and video.
* **fish-train:** fixed data fetching on first connection with anonymous account.
* **fish-train:** remove labels from time travelling bar as they are unreadable in many cases.
* **fish-trains:** better responsive layout for fish trains listing.
* **gearsets:** fixed import from pcap sometimes not working.
* **layout:** fixed final items sometimes shown as can be skipped entirely.
* **leveling-equipment:** filter items that do not contribute main stats.
* **step-by-step:** fixed player location not shown in overlay.


### Features

* **alarm-button:** display map name in location popup.
* **db:** now showing radius around nodes and mob spawns on maps when they can have some.
* **list-details:** add tooltip to the fill from inventory button.
* **list-details:** new add items button at the top of the page.
* **settings:** new setting to disable slow mode notification for crafting/gathering.
* **simulator:** min stats popup now accounts for collectable thresholds.
* **simulator:** support for splendorous tools bonus on good condition.
* **step-by-step:** you can now hover aetherytes to see their name.
